name: Great Bray-Shaman

abilities.name: Dominate the Weak
abilities.description: If you roll a 6 for the attack roll when using Savage Dominion, you can immediately move the affected target and then make a weapon action with it against an adversary of your choice. The affected target is then stunned.

abilities.name: Bestial Vigour
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of round. While it is there, add 1 to the Damage of 1+ weapon action of the Great Bray-Shaman and any other heroes in the same chamber.

renown: If you use Dominate the Weak to inflict a wound on an adversary, gain 2 renown.
